main.bio: I am a Computer Science (major) and Business (minor) graduate with coding experience in Java, Javascript, Python, PHP, and C. My way of working is methodical and meticulous. Quick on the uptake of new information, ideas, business requirements, and technologies, I strive to provide value at the workplace by adapting quickly and maintaining a strong work ethic. As a recent graduate ready to enter the software industry, I am interested in learning and practicing both front-end and back-end development further, and am eager to be given an opportunity to prove that I am up to the task.

work.title: Business Tools Developer
work.description: My main project at this internship was to perform an integration for the RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) workflow of the company among Salesforce, Liferay-Teamroom, and Agile JIRA, using Java, APEX, SOAP web-services, and REST web-services. My work enabled the automation of the workflow, enabling the elimination of the need for manual monitoring and data entry, making the process more effincient and reliable, while also reducing the cost of operation. Additionally , I performed system administration, database administration, change requests, and extensive documentation.
